channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: China Dives in on the World’s First Wind-Powered Undersea Data Center
item.description: The $226 million project uses ocean breezes and seawater to stay cool.

item.title: CEO of Alphabet’s X, Astro Teller, on what makes a moonshot
item.description: Teller says X has a 2% hit rate, which means that most of the things the company tries don't work out, and that's okay.

item.title: The Republican Plan to Reform the Census Could Put Everyone’s Privacy at Risk
item.description: A little-known algorithmic process called “differential privacy” helps keep census data anonymous. Conservatives want it gone.

item.title: Why Nicholas Thompson Made a Custom GPT to Run Faster
item.description: The Atlantic CEO’s new book, The Running Ground, examines his complicated relationship with the sport. On this week’s episode of The Big Interview, he...

item.title: OpenAI offers free ChatGPT Go for one year to all users in India
item.description: ChatGPT Go is now free for Indian users under a limited-time promotional offer.

item.title: How to Set Up a Google Home Security System: Best Cameras, Doorbells, and Other Devices
item.description: If you want to secure your home, Google’s Nest range is one of the smartest and easiest ways. Here’s how.

item.title: Alienware 16X Aurora Review: A Return to Form for This Gaming Laptop
item.description: After lots of starts and stops, Alienware has a winner on its hands that finally nails the balance between price, performance, and premium features.

item.title: Zoom CEO Eric Yuan says AI will shorten our workweek
item.description: Zoom CEO Eric Yuan says that, in a few years, we should be working a 3-4 day workweek because of AI.

item.title: Venture capital is not an asset class, says Sequoia’s Roelof Botha
item.description: Sequoia's managing partner Roelof Botha noted that there are currently 3,000 venture firms in the United States, while there were just 1,000 when he j...

item.title: PayPal partners with OpenAI to let users pay for their shopping within ChatGPT
item.description: Paypal said on Tuesday that it is adopting a protocol in combination with OpenAI's "Instant Checkout" feature to let users pay for their shopping dire...
